message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. What do you say?
Your turn, Alice. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?  It's better than waiting and both losing value.
I'm willing to compromise, but a 55/45 split feels more fair. Let's get this done before things get worse.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you a deal where you still get almost half! Time is running out - take the deal!
